description: Pandasaurus Games is set to release three new board games in August: “Umbrella,” “Infiltraitors,” and “Don’t Skip Leg Day.” Each game offers distinct themes and mechanics, catering to a variety of players. Umbrella: Strategic Color Coordination Designed by Flavien Dauphin and Benoit Turpin with artwork by Vincent Dutrait, “Umbrella” accommodates 1-4 players aged 8 and...
title: Pandasaurus Games Announces Three New Board Games for August Release

description: The upcoming D&D 5E supplement, “Fabled Empire,” is set to introduce a fairytale twist to the Dungeons & Dragons universe. Spanning over 180 pages, this resource blends modern and traditional fairytales with fairy mythology, designed for use with D&D 5E and the forthcoming 2024 Edition. “Fabled Empire” offers an array of new monsters, each depicted...
title: Fabled Empire is Bringing Fairytale Magic to Dungeons & Dragons

description: Mighty Paladin Games is charting a course towards the release of their new pirate-themed strategy game, “Rogue Seas,” set to debut on Kickstarter on June 18th. The game, designed with a pirate theme, combines elements of strategy, crew building, and treasure hunting. Players are invited to assume the roles of legendary pirate captains, each equipped...
title: Mighty Paladin Games Sets Sail with “Rogue Seas” on Kickstarter This June
